title: Bitter Sweet Release: An erotic story of humiliation and betrayal
description: In this short (approximately 3000 words) CFNM fantasy, a slave gets the shock of his life when his Mistress outs him to their two female long-time family friends.When Jenna becomes "Madam J" and Margaret becomes "Miss Maggie," everything he thought he knew about their long-time family friends is turned upside down, leaving him to cope with the new arrangement. This book contains explicit descriptions of mail nudity, and male and female genitalia and orgasms. It is suggested for readers over the age of 18.
author: Kenneth Bryant
